me palasthin wimukthi sanwidhanaya ratak nomathi janathawage nithyanukula niyojithaya lesa nobanda wyaparaya magin piliganu labanawa.nobandi wyaparaya palasthina wimukthi sanwidhanaya pili ganimath samanga ma 1975 sirimawo bandaranayaka mathiniyage rajya magin palasthina wimukthi sanwidhanayata thanapathi waraprasada piri namimata gath thinduwa edata sapekshawa suwisheshi radikal piyawarak.ee samangama bihi wana palasthina udesa wu shri lanka sahodarathwa kamituwe aarambhaka samajikaya wanne wathman shri lanka janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathayi.

meya (allah wisin) niyama kara athi kotasa we. 4-8 shuddha wu kuraanaya thawada (urumayan) khedana wita pawulata sambandha nadayinda” anath daruwan ha dilindan pamina sitiyahoth owuntada eyin yamak di karunanwitha wachanayen numbaala amathiya yuthuya. 4-9 shuddha wu kuraanaya thamangen (maranayen) pasu asarana daruparapurak thaba yathoth owunge anagathaya pilibandawa (ketharam oonakamak dakwa thibuneda yath, eya janaya awabodha karagena) eeta biya wethwa, enisa owun allahta biyabathimath wiya yuthuya.
